dmca.title: Music Software Companies Request Programs' Removal from Google Groups
dmca.body:
Aug 23 02 08:38a	[private]	[private]	P.1

LEGAL RESEARCH ASSOCIATES, LP
[private]
Bakersfield, CA 93389-1133
[private] E-mail: [private]@Nukepirates.com

August 8, 2002

DMCA Notice #:

re: http://groups.google.com/groups?q=tascam&hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8&safe=off&scoring= d&selm=3D5162F4.81DADB58%40ath.forthnet.gr&rnum=1

Gentlemen:

We are the attorneys and copyright agents for a number of software publishers, including NemeSys Music and Steinberg Media.

It has come to our attention that a post in the google groups unlawfully offers several of our clients' copyrighted software programs for distribution/sale.

Please REMOVE the above-referenced post.

The post appears to have originated from a user of forthnet.gr, and we would further request that Forthnet take appropriate action to delete the post from the other news group (alt.cracks.nl.newbie) involved and take appropriate action against the poster to prevent further infringing activity.

Regards,

[private]
Copyright Enforcement Agent

ELECTRONIC NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owners being named:

TEAC America, Inc. dba NemeSys Music Technologies, Inc.
Steinberg Media Technologies, AG - Hamburg, Germany

I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed below are not authorized by the above IP Owners, their agents, or the law and therefore infringe the TP Owner's rights. I further aver that the information contained in the Notice below is accurate.

Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing.

I may be contacted at:

Printed Name: [private]
Title: Copyright Enforcement Agent
Company: Legal Research Associates, LP
Street Address: [private]
City and State: Bakersfield, CA
Zip: 93389-1133
Email (correspondence): [private]@NukePirates.com
Telephone: [private]
Fax: [private]


Truthfully,

/S/: [private]

Allegedly Infringing items or materials:

Infringed Work or Right:
Cubase SX 
Nuendo 
GigaStudio 1.60 

Original Materials & Copyright Holder(s):

Copyrighted materials belonging to Steinberg Media:
Cubase SX
Nuendo

Location of ORIGINAL WORKS: 
http://www.steinberg.net and http://www.steinberg.de

Copyrighted materials belonging to NemeSys Music: 
GigaStudio 1.60 

Location of ORIGINAL WORKS. 

http://www.nemesysmusic.com/

URL(s) of Infringed Works or Right:
